comments.body:
I think we should also check `hIsTerminalDevice stdin` and `hIsTerminalDevice stdout` to make sure we're using an interactive shell, otherwise we shouldn't be doing interactive prompts like this.

I'm afraid this PR would break existing shell scripts (and other integrations) without a check like that.
good point, I'll add a check.
